name: Flight Rising Readable Vista Usernames
description: Reverts usernames on the forums while adding a translucent, white fade behind them to maintain readability on vistas. Should be much easier to read, but will degrade highlighting when selecting text.
additional_info:
Sorry I can't provide a screenshot. Given the completely ridiculous controversy regarding whether userstyles are against the TOS I'm not willing to risk displaying my own or anyone else's username.

Should now work across multiple browsers, thanks to something ~Inkay caught and figured out how to fix!
